attributes.action: recognise Timmy Mallett in the New Years Honours list
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
One of this country's truly great eccentrics, Timmy Mallet is probably best remembered as the presenter of the popular children's entertainment series 'Wacaday', that ran on TV-am between 1985 and 1992 as part of The Wide Awake Club.

He actually made his name in radio broadcasting, which he has been involved with since the 1970's, before becoming one of our most popular television personalities.

Not only has he used his talent and personality to also carve out a successful music career with Bombalurina, he has used his success to help raise money for many charities over the years, and not many people know that he is actually an accomplished artist as well.

I believe that he should be recognised for his contribution to children's entertainment and for services to broadcasting over the last 30 years.
